title: 3 Quick Steps to Get Long Baddie Nails in Dress to Impress

steps.title: Talk to the NPC Lina.
steps.content: Talk to the NPC Lina. This NPC can be found to the left of the Salon entrance. She will be sitting at a desk with nail polish. Behind her, there will be a large bulletin board. [1] X Research source Once you interact with her, a customization menu will open.

steps.title: Select Baddie Nails.
steps.content: Select Baddie Nails . This is the option to get long nails in Dress to Impress. Currently, this is the only other nail option aside from Default . Once selected, your character will have long nails.

steps.title: Change the color.
steps.content: Change the color. Use the same pop-up menu to customize your character's nails. You can use the Wheel , Palette , or Patterns tab to find a color or design. You can't change the color using Lina; you must use the bulletin board to do so. Once you're finished, you can exit the menu.
